Design of the site

The folks behind the site have kept it colorful and pretty decent, thanks to its green background and unique yellow and purple font design. If you don’t like these colors, then you might think the site looks dull. But I feel it’s a breath of fresh air from the all-popular black and red color schemes that we’re used to seeing on most porn sites on the net.

data.detailedDescription:
Sex stories make for a perfect build-up to a night of masturbation marathon, or for a cool down after you have gassed yourself out jacking off to porn. And lucky for us, the internet is flooding with so many of sexy stories we could make an encyclopedia if we put them all together.

One of the best sites to find erotic stories for a horny pastime is literotica.com.

It’s a diverse site with all sorts of genres to choose from. Besides, there is a whole lot more than just a bunch of sex stories, I will be getting into the nitty-gritty of the meatier bits in a few.

Also, we are going to be drilling down to the sex group stories category only, but before then, let’s get a scope of what the site is all about. This should give you a feel of what to expect.

Let’s get this show on the road.

Design of the site

Then there’s a categories tab on the right side. This is more like a collection of adult content sites listed here. They link out to various sites like Live Cams, sex stories and dirty talks videos, and a variety of other hot action sites that you will love.

The sex group stories category is designed for absolute ease as far as filtering and navigation. The right side of the page is pretty much just a blank space. I have no fucking idea why this is so. Heck, they should have thought of listing several images there to keep our cocks on standby as we check out everything else.

But anyway, at least this space isn’t full of those fucking ads we often see on most sites. That would suck as fuck. By the way, I have no grumbles to make about ads on this site, I haven’t had any of them ruin my day yet.

Just about all we need is to the left of the page, but do note that this is also neatly split into two columns. There’s the bigger one with the site name and link to the homepage at the very top.

Then it’s right into the one function that makes navigation so easy – the alphabetical order of the different stories. This categorizes the stories in alphabetical order so you can just click on a letter and right away narrow down to the stories with titles that start with that letter.

And now, onto the juicy stuff, the stories. These too are categorized into three sections. These include the new stories at the top for those chronic masturbators who have been checking back now and then.

There is the random stories category down the page, let’s just say for those looking for anything worth getting their cocks’ attention and love a bit of unpredictability. Then even further down is the Hall of Fame section with even more exciting stuff.

The smaller column on the right of the main column is several options. At the very top, we have the log-in and sign-up options at the top. Right below this is the Lit design for site users who wanna access all the naughtiness here on mobile. But hold onto that for a while, I will get into it in a minute.

Scroll slightly more, and you get into the contest winners section. Then it’s down to the recent comments section, and then to popular tags. Further down the column is the section for the recently popular stuff, and towards the end is the popular authors' area.

These last two sections stand out in that you can select the time range you want to focus on, which ranges from 1 day to 1 week and even as far back as 30 days.

At the very bottom is the feedback section, where you can click through to the feedback form. This is rather awesome since you don’t necessarily have to sign up to submit your feedback on any section or page.

Content of the site

Whichever one tickles your weewee, you will love how the authors build up the momentum from the start as the events culminate into an explosive climax that will also leave your cock erupting with jets of cream.

I also love how the chapter you’re currently at is aptly indicated along with the title at the very top, kind of making it easy to follow up on every chapter.

The author is also indicated right before the start of the story and at the end of the page, and this is a link to their account. We can also see how many stories the author has uploaded onto this site, which also doubles as a link so you can follow it to check out other stories.

A quick look at the right side of the story page are several handy tabs like “story info”, “Story tags”, “Series”, “Share”, and “Font settings”. You will also get a short description of the story here, as well as how long the story is, rating, views, and how many have saved it as one of their favorites.

Besides the handy functions on each page, it’s safe to say the stories on this site are content-rich. And not just a bunch of words put together by some horny bastard typing on his mother’s computer down in a basement.

Although the content on here is mostly submitted by amateur Literotica authors, I have to say the owners of these stories are going the distance to come up with well-thought-out and outlined stories and take that extra mile to work on the editing.

The result is a copy that will not only get your cock rock hard but one that you will also love and enjoy reading through. You will be having a fun time with most of these stories so much that you will be caught by surprise to find out it’s over.

Mobile/Desktop Experience

I guess that’s why we have the New Lit Design I mentioned earlier. This one is dedicated exclusively to mobile device users, while the older version is ideal for desktop use. I have to say the guys behind this site made a smart move to bring us both of these versions. Now whether you are reading a sex story between the sheets or getting a perv peep at work, you shouldn’t have any concerns despite the device you are using.

What I like about this site

If you are just checking it out for curiosity, you will love the fact that you don’t necessarily need to create an account to access the stories here. Of course, creating an account makes life so much easier for you on the site, and you will have more control over the content, but for one-visit wankers, you don’t need to.

Navigation and filtering have also been neatly taken care of, you don’t need to be a website developer to locate your type of stories on this site. It’s all there for you to choose from. Besides, the fact that we don’t have to deal with tons of ads is super awesome, too.

Suggestions I have for the site
